dct_description_sm: Map of the Kimberley area in the Northern Cape showing the town of Kimberley, divisional and field cornetcy boundaries, the relative positions of the Orange Free State as well as the divisions of Barkly West and Herbert, farm boundaries, farm names, property numbers, some owner names and dates, railways and railway stations, roads, commonages, outspans, public outspans, rivers and springs.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Property rights reside with the repository. Copyright (c) Stanford University. All Rights Reserved.
